body:
Comment 4: 
"function ends without return statement"
- fixed a long time ago

"illegal break label"
- fixed with revisions ae8d4475f6d5, dd3d253e539e

"pointless call of builtin", e.g. go append(x), defer real(x).
- fixed together with the "declared and not used" checks (below)

"foo declared and not used"
- fixed with revisions 81f091228296, 0467cd19dcd4, 7ab34ca96336, 73ce43ee19e5

defer append([]string{}, "foo") doesn't cause a type error.
- fixed with one of the revisions above
_Status changed to **Fixed**._
